resources.string: There are no saved trails.\n Click the plus sign in the Action Bar\n to record a new trail.
That name has already been used.\nEither try a new name or cancel.
Adjust the frequency of location updates, less frequent = better battery life.
To get the most out of this app and prevent crashes, get GooglePlay Services before continuing.

This app will record and plot a route on a map. From the initial screen, choose the plus sign to start recording a trail. While recording, click the camera icon to tag a photo to your current location and to the trail. To finish recording, click the save icon. To review previous hikes, choose from the list in the main screen.

Version 1.0
Authors: Thomas Powell and Mike Patterson
Mobile Device Programming Project 3
Fall 2013
Choose the appearance of the map
